content.description: Start in steep dihedral seam. Pull the overhang and enter the crux from bolts 4-6.
content.location: Furthest right route at the Cave Sector.

climbs.name: Natural Selection
climbs.fa: Cole Paiement, Dec. 2020 (bolted by Zack Nay)

content.description: Begin up the back wall of the cave on smooth bubbly rock and gain the obvious horizontal weakness below the roof. Make a big move to reach a large rail, and then hold it together on small holds pulling onto the slabby head wall.
content.location: There are two bolted lines starting in the main cave. Natural Selection is on the right, and an open project is on the left.

content.description: Starts on the far right side of the cave, gaining the vertical, streaked headwall above.
Starts on the dimpled, porcelain shield to the right of the cave proper. Climbs up through streaked headwall above.
content.location: Second route right of the cave.

content.description: Delicate, powerful climbing on exceptional stone. Start at the base of a steep orange bulge and boulder your way to a mid-route rest. The upper vertical headwall is less physically demanding, but does provide plenty of technical challenge.
content.location: Climbs the striking orange streak right of Solar Flare.

content.description: Easily identified from the road by the obvious cave feature in the center of the wall. Only two of the routes in this sector actually tackle the cave proper, while the others climb the more vertical wall to the right.
